Documentation: describe here how you will document your work, will you use readme files, software such as Zotero or Nvivo, notebooks? 
Storage/Preservation: It is more secure to use a KU Leuven recommended storage solution that makes automatic backups, the storage guide can hep you choose: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: peer reviewed publications are not in the scope of a DMP, will you share any data underlying these publication?
